row.name: ASPIRE.SHARED.SCHEDULE.TOGGLE.RECURRING
row.description: Toggle the RECURRING jobs Start or Stop

row.process:
!Script to start or stop the Recurring Schedule Jobs !Parameter TOGGLE will be passed here as GO or STOP !:IF &VALIDATE_VAR# <> 1 !: PRINT "HI" !: DEFINE &RECURRING_SCHEDULES#, string, 10 !:ENDIF !:PRINT &VALIDATE_VAR#
:SET &LENGTH# = LENGTH(&RECURRING_SCHEDULES#[]) :PRINT &RECURRING_SCHEDULES#[1] :SET &NL# = UC_CRLF() :PRINT &NL# :PRINT " Total Jobs For Recurring : &LENGTH# and TOGGLE = &TOGGLE# &NL#" :SET &COUNT# = 1 :WHILE &COUNT# <= &LENGTH# : PRINT &NL# : PRINT " Currently Processing : &RECURRING_SCHEDULES#[&COUNT#] " : SET &RUNID# = GET_UC_OBJECT_NR(&RECURRING_SCHEDULES#[&COUNT#]) : PRINT " RUNID of the Job = &RUNID# " : IF &RUNID# = "" : PRINT " EMPTY RUNID &RUNID# Means Job is not currently scheduled to Toggle status " : ELSE : SET &STATUS# = TOGGLE_OBJECT_STATUS(&RUNID#, &TOGGLE#) : IF &STATUS# = 0 : PRINT " SUCCESS - Changed the Job Status Successfully to : &TOGGLE# , Status = &STATUS#" : ELSE : PRINT " FAILED to Change the Job Status to : &TOGGLE# , Status = &STATUS#" : ENDIF : ENDIF : SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 :ENDWHILE
